item.title: Scratchpad
item.description: getting wsl to work behind proxy set proxy for wsl Acquire::http::Proxy "http://proxy.foo.com:8080"; in your /etc/apt/apt.conf file set proxy for pip in .config/pip/pip.conf file [global] trusted-host = pypi.python.org pypi.org files.pythonhosted.org require-virtualenv = true proxy = http://proxy2.lmco.com:80 set proxy for git, append this to the bottom of your ~/.gitconfig [http] proxy = http://proxy2.lmco.com:80 Vim grepping #vim grep directly in vim :grep -r PDU **/*.
